name: Stories of Ghosts
description:
Kill enough ghosts to be able to advanced onto the next story of the tower without losing all your health. There are 5 different stories and to win, you must kill all the ghosts on the 5th story with health remaining.

This was worked on by two people and created for the weekly game jam. This is our first game jam and our first game that we have both published to the public. The week is 57 and the theme is "ghost story." We decided to take an approach of containing ghosts with stories in a tower rather than a story in reference to a short novel.
